reviewText: This is a great offer. Getting the first three seasons of Charmed inroduces you to the first three powerful beautfiul charmed ones. Prue(Shannen),Piper(Holly) and Phobe(Alyssa). In the three seasons you see great supense and humor and conflict within the charmed cricle. This show has great action and drama. The ladies prefrom with great intelligence, security and respect. This show deserves an emmy award. CHARMED ONES KICKS ASS!!
